articles.author: Joe Cash
articles.title: China's exports soar past forecast as factories front-run Trump tariff threat - Reuters
articles.description: China's exports grew at the fastest pace in over two years in October as factories rushed inventory to major markets in anticipation of further tariffs from the U.S. and the European Union, as the threat of a two-front trade war loomed large.

articles.title: Australia proposes ban on social media for those under 16 - Reuters
